text: Auressio is a village and former municipality of the district of Locarno in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. In 2001 the municipality was merged with the other, neighboring municipalities Berzona and Loco to form a new and larger municipality Isorno.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 == References == Category:Villages in Ticino Category:Former municipalities of Ticino
title: Auressio
